trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的個別資料格<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCell class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell 類別代表個別儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>所包含的資料格

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a DataGridViewCell identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 資料列和資料行的 DataGridViewCell 識別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>的儲存格的位置

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: 典型的資料格都包含特有的資料列和資料行包含它的資料。

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定其屬性，並處理與它相關聯的事件，您可以在數種方式自訂儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>指派給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制從這個方法傳回的執行個體，請覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>目前已指派至控制項，建立一個新執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 的 「 Active Accessibility"區段[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>指派給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 修改輸入資料格框線樣式，依據指定的準則。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustCellBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項在內部呼叫 AdjustCellBorderStyle 方法，以決定資料格框線的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項通常會使用值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>屬性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>作為輸入的儲存格樣式不支援值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>表示若要修改的資料格框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>用來儲存中繼變更的資料格框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>將垂直框線加入儲存格。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>水平框線加入儲存格。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果裝載儲存格位於第一個可見資料行;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果裝載儲存格位於第一個可見資料列。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The modified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，代表所有儲存格邊界的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格框線的預設寬度是一個像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值即可修改框線的寬度:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>代表 0 像素寬度的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值增加 1 像素的預設寬度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>屬性設定的儲存格的擁有者的資料列時，矩形的高度加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>屬性已設定儲存格的擁有者的資料行， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>值增加矩形的寬度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>邊界所計算。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，代表所有儲存格邊界的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 指出當按下儲存格的資料列是否取消共用。

trans-unit.source: The ClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ClickUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>作用就是取消共用儲存格的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref>包含的資料傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果會取消資料列，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基底<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>類別一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: 建立此儲存格完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 每當您衍生自的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>類別，然後將新屬性，可在衍生類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>覆寫複製方法

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示複製<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個儲存格的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 包含資料列標頭的資料列的資料行索引的值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格; 資料行的索引如果資料格不包含資料行內，為-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: 取得圍住儲存格之內容區域的週框矩形。

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的矩形會報告用戶端座標，像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>方法來取得其值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>型別，這個值為<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>。</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>基底

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得儲存格，而不是資料格內容的週框矩形，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>圍繞儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-資料格，則資料行的標頭資料格。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>屬性小於 0，表示儲存格的資料列標題儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 指出當按下儲存格的內容儲存格的資料列是否取消共用。

trans-unit.source: The ContentClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ContentClickUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>作用就是取消共用儲存格的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref>包含的資料傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 指出當按兩下儲存格的內容時儲存格的資料列是否取消共用。

trans-unit.target: ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與儲存格相關聯的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指出當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料格時，通常會顯示快顯功能表。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`，取得 ContextMenuStrip 屬性引發的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>控制項事件，並傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設為指定的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有事件處理常式，會取得 ContextMenuStrip 屬性的值傳回先前指定的值或其預設值`null`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ContextMenuStrip value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件時，主要是使用大量的資料，以設定儲存格 ContextMenuStrip 多個資料格的值時，避免效能的負面影響。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 變更這個屬性會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>上擁有事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定快顯功能表，針對個別資料列，而不是個別儲存格的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性或處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell ContextMenuStrip property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 資料格 ContextMenuStrip 屬性設定會覆寫的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定值，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件覆寫兩者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件和資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定`null`對於儲存格捷徑功能表，不過，若要避免覆寫的資料列的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value for a cell in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 取得新記錄的資料列中的資料格的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultNewRowValue property in the base class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別中的 DefaultNewRowValue 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>一律會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: However, this property can be overridden in derived cell classes to return other default values.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這個屬性可以傳回其他預設值的衍生資料格類別中被覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property is displayed if the cell is in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格是在新記錄的資料列，會顯示這個屬性所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: This value can be overridden by a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName> event when focus enters the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會覆寫的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>焦點資料列中輸入新記錄的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示預設值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>目前儲存格裝載編輯控制項和編輯模式結束時呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>屬性相關聯的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>的值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: This is the case, for example, when the control is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 時，這種情況下，例如控制項不是處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料格目前是否顯示螢幕上。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether a particular cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷是否已經出螢幕外捲動特定資料格。

trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>屬性值是`false`，這個屬性會傳回`false`也。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果儲存格顯示於螢幕上或螢幕上部分;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>所佔用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 指出當按兩下儲存格時儲存格的資料列是否取消共用。

trans-unit.source: The DoubleClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: DoubleClickUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>作用就是取消共用儲存格的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref>包含的資料傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果會取消資料列，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基底<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>類別一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前已格式化值的儲存格值，不管儲存格是否處於編輯模式，而值尚未認可。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the current value of the cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回目前儲存格的值，或編輯控制項，如果儲存格處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, getting the value of this property converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否則，取得這個屬性的值資料格將值轉換為相等的顯示類型的值所指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 這會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>事件，您可以處理以自訂值的轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式設定不成功，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有處理常式集合或這個事件沒有處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`，擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前，其格式的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-資料格，則資料行的標頭資料格。

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 格式設定失敗，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項或處理常式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的裝載之編輯控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: A derived cell type overrides this property to return the type of its hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的資料格類型會覆寫這個屬性，傳回裝載的編輯控制項的類型。

trans-unit.target: 如果資料格沒有編輯控制項，如同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>，EditType 屬性會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"></xref>型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row will be unshared when the focus moves to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指出當焦點移至資料格父資料列是否取消共用。

trans-unit.source: The EnterUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EnterUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>作用就是取消共用包含儲存格的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者動作將焦點移至儲存格。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果程式設計作業將焦點移至儲存格。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列會取消共用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基底<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>類別一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the error icon for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格之錯誤圖示的界限。

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的矩形會報告用戶端座標，像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`false`，這個屬性的值為<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>。</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A>方法來取得其值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>類型，這個值一律為<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the error icon for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，代表目前的錯誤圖示的界限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料格不屬於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>小於 0，表示儲存格的資料列標題儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-資料格，則資料行的標頭資料格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述與儲存格相關聯的錯誤狀況的文字。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ErrorText property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: ErrorText 屬性通常用在處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the ErrorText property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格的值失敗某些驗證準則，設定 ErrorText 屬性和設定取消的認可作業<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs>至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字即會顯示由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，並提示使用者在儲存格的資料來修正錯誤。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是`true`，您可以提供錯誤文字的資料列和資料格使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different ErrorText string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當您指派不同的 ErrorText 字串的儲存格，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，就會引發。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 4.5.2，錯誤圖示的調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 描述與儲存格相關聯的錯誤狀況的文字。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 釋出 unmanaged 的資源並執行其他清除作業之前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>撘`false`做為參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的值格式化，以供顯示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the FormattedValue is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性是資料格，所包含的實際資料物件，而 f 則是格式化的表示法，此物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性分別對應至這些值的資料型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的值呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>方法，將儲存格的值轉換為相等的顯示值所表示的型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 這會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>事件，您可以處理以自訂值的轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式設定不成功，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有處理常式集合或這個事件沒有處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`，擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料格的格式化的值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果儲存格不屬於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>小於 0，表示儲存格的資料列標題儲存格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-資料格，則資料行的標頭資料格。

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 格式設定失敗，而且沒有處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項或處理常式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換輸入<xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格相關聯之格式化值的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性是資料格，所包含的實際資料物件，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>屬性是資料的格式化的表示法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>和 FormattedValueType 屬性分別對應至這些值的資料型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表類型的資料格的格式化值。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已凍結的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Frozen property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: 凍結屬性的值取決於儲存格的父資料列和資料行的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's Frozen property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Frozen`資料列或資料行的屬性設定為`true`，也會儲存格的凍結屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已凍結的儲存格;，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取要複製到儲存格的格式化的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來擷取剪貼簿格式的值，表示儲存格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的值第一次擷取顯示格式從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>來格式化值的事件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>如果格式設定不成功的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的位置相關參數指出此儲存格中表示的區域中選取的資料格所定義之資料的資料表中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: 根據儲存格的位置，額外的資訊可能會傳回這個方法，以及顯示格式化儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料列的第一個資料行中的資料格的 HTML 格式將會包含表示資料列開頭的標記。

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 支援剪貼簿格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event.

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件處理常式可以修改同時`value`和`cellStyle`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定此處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`true`，不過，這個方法會格式化`value`使用的格式屬性`cellStyle`物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not convert `value` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value for values equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會轉換`value`至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值的值等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>以外設定為值<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>或`null`。</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>事件 以顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control used to edit the cell.
trans-unit.target: 初始化用來編輯儲存格的控制項。

trans-unit.source: As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> share a single hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 做為最佳化技巧，通常所有儲存格相同類型，而且在同一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>共用單一裝載編輯控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the InitializeEditingControl method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，使用的儲存格控制項之前，它需要初始化 InitializeEditingControl 方法。

trans-unit.source: The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫時，這個方法就會將控制項加入至編輯控制項在其父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>清單

trans-unit.source: It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它也會初始化某些資料格的視覺屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, InitializeEditingControl sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，InitializeEditingControl 設定編輯以符合提供的儲存格樣式參數區域的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to InitializeEditingControl do nothing.
trans-unit.target: InitializeEditingControl 的後續呼叫會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class corresponding to their type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別會使用這個方法來裝載的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別對應到其類型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, a table that contains one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> objects calls this method to add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> editing control to the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，包含一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>物件會呼叫這個方法可加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>編輯控制項至主控<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>單一</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>資料表

trans-unit.target: 儲存格的位置以零為起始的資料列索引。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示當編輯開始時，儲存格所顯示的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>表示儲存格的樣式。

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> or if one is present, it does not have an associated editing control.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>或如果存在的話，它並沒有相關聯的編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this cell is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否為目前正在編輯這個儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you are working directly with cell instances.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用直接與資料格執行個體，這個屬性是很有用。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName> event to determine when the user enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>事件，以判斷使用者時進入編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果儲存格處於編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row is unshared if the user presses a key while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否使用者按下按鍵焦點位於資料格上時，是否取消共用父資料列。

trans-unit.source: The KeyDownUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: KeyDownUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>引數的效果的取消共用包含儲存格的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref>表示已按下按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if edit mode should be started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果編輯應該啟動模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared if a key is pressed while a cell in the row has focus.
trans-unit.target: 指出如果資料列中的資料格具有焦點時按下按鍵的資料列是否取消共用。

trans-unit.source: The KeyPressUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: KeyPressUnsharesRow 方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, it must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，它必須傳回`true`如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>作用就是取消共用包含儲存格的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Converts a value formatted for display to an actual cell value.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換為實際的資料格的值顯示格式化的值。

trans-unit.source: When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者編輯儲存格的值，並認可變更，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會呼叫此方法，將轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>從顯示的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 控制項接著設基礎資料格的值或資料來源值轉換的值。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會剖析`formattedValue`參數使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>所指示的儲存格樣式屬性`cellStyle`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property or `null` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formattedValue`等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，這個方法傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>屬性或`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>是<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>和儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>是參考型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method parses `formattedValue` using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the specified or default converters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formattedValue`不等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，這個方法會剖析`formattedValue`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性和指定或預設轉換子。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is nullable, this method wraps the return value as a <xref:System.Nullable%601> type.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>是可為 null，這個方法會包裝傳回的值做為<xref:System.Nullable%601>型別。</xref:System.Nullable%601> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 顯示儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: Because the editing control may take up more space than a single cell, it may need to be positioned differently when editing a cell in the first visible column or first visible row so it does not paint outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of a rectangular area into which the cell can fit.
trans-unit.target: 取得能夠容納的資料格的矩形區域的像素為單位的大小。

trans-unit.source: The PreferredSize property returns the natural size of the cell computed by the cell's owning row and column.
trans-unit.target: PreferredSize 屬性會傳回自然擁有儲存格的資料列和資料行所計算的資料格的大小。

trans-unit.source: PreferredSize returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1 if the cell is not contained in a table.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 PreferredSize<xref:System.Drawing.Size>寬度和高度，如果資料格不包含資料表中的-1。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property set to `false`, -1 is returned for the width.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>屬性設定為`false`，寬度則傳回-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列是共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-資料格，則資料行的標頭資料格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell's data can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可編輯儲存格的資料。

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 屬性會指出是否可編輯儲存格所顯示的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can set ReadOnly for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將 ReadOnly 設定個別資料格，或您可以將整個資料列或資料行的資料格為唯讀藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，如果儲存格的父資料列或資料行設為唯讀，則子資料格會採用相同的值。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default behavior by setting ReadOnly for individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定個別資料格的 ReadOnly 覆寫此預設行為。

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以瀏覽至唯讀的資料格，並且可以設定為目前的儲存格的唯讀資料格。

trans-unit.source: ReadOnly only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 只會影響是否在資料格時，才能編輯;它不會影響是否使用者可以刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell's data cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以調整儲存格的大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Resizable property is set by the cell's parent row or column.
trans-unit.target: 可調整大小屬性的值會設定儲存格的父資料列或資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的父資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: When the RowIndex property returns -1, the cell is either a column header, or the cell's row is shared.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 屬性會傳回-1 資料格，則任一資料行標頭，或共用儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格; 資料列的索引-1 表示沒有主控資料列。

trans-unit.target: 取得儲存格的大小。

trans-unit.target: 如果資料格不是與相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，Size 屬性傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Size>寬度和高度為-1。</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>
